text: 3.9 1 Ti 1.4, 2 Ti 2.14-16, 2.23, Tat 1.14 Nad pen, takaw nɨgep ma nɨgep ag amɨl apɨl gɨpal ak, apɨs based chɨn takaw agebal ak, takaw penpen ag amɨl apɨl gɨpal ak, takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨŋɨd ag gɨl penpen yɨbɨl apal ak, takaw anɨb okok mɨdupsek kud ñɨnɨmɨn. Jɨj olap ma mɨdeb, binɨb okok kɨlop gek mɨdtep gɨnɨgel tek ma lup.
